title: Futbol Americas: Gregg Berhalter joins the show in-studio
description:
On Monday's episode of Futbol Americas, Herculez Gomez and Sebastian Salazar are joined in-studio by USMNT head coach Gregg Berhalter. The coach talks about position battles heading into Qatar World Cup, USA-Mexico rivalry, and the exclusion of John Brooks from the USMNT. Next, Chelsea FC and USMNT winger Christian Pulisic sits down with Herc for an exclusive interview. The playmaker talks about his current situation at Chelsea and his expectations with USMNT at the World Cup.

itunes:subtitle: Christian Pulisic sits down with Herculez Gomez for a one-on-one exclusive interview
